messages.subject: new best friend
messages.msgSnippet: Oh Juli, I love you -- will you be my best friend?!  -- see, it s just I loved what you said and how you said it, and John Irving is one of
messages.messageBody:
Oh Juli, I love you -- will you be my best friend?!
<Composing myself> -- see, it's just I loved what you
said and how you said it, and John Irving is one of my
favorite authors.

Sure! I can use all the best friends I can get! I've
read every book of John Irving's and I did a big
project/presentation on him for a comic lit class. My
all time favorite is still Garp. I know most Irving
fans rave most over Owen Meany, and I loved that, too,
but Garp's my man. I even named my goldfish Garp (pun
on carp, which goldfish are, you know). Juli
